content: A truly incredible queen sacrifice was made by Kevin Spragett against Fred South in Ontario 1976: 1.e4 Nc6 2.Nf3 d6 3.d4 Bg4 4.d5 Ne5 5.Nxe5 Bxd1. Black gave up on the nineteenth move.
translations: ita:Un sacrificio di donna davvero incredibile è stato fatto da Kevin Spragett contro Fred South in Ontario 1976﹕ 1.e4 Cc6 2
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
